sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Human Trafficking Resource Center Notice Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Human Trafficking Resource Center Notice Act.

sections.heading: Model notice. sections.text: Model notice. No later than 6 months after the effective date of this Act, the Department of Human Services shall: (i) develop a model notice that complies with the requirements of Section 10 of this Act; or (ii) adopt a model notice developed by the Illinois Task Force on Human Trafficking that complies with the requirements of Section 10 of this Act. The Department of Human Services shall make the model notice available for download on the Department's Internet website. Upon request, the Department of Human Services shall furnish copies of the model notice without charge to a business, establishment, or school identified in Section 5.
